content: Subzone of Pioneer Planning Area in Singapore **Gul Circle** (or **Gul**) is an area in [Jurong Industrial Estate](/wiki/Jurong_Industrial_Estate) which is the biggest industrial estate in Singapore. Gul is the home to many heavy industries in Singapore. It is bounded by [Ayer Rajah Expressway](/wiki/Ayer_Rajah_Expressway) (Jalan Ahmad Ibrahim), Benoi Road, Pioneer Road and Tuas Road. Tuas Fire Station is located at Gul as well. The area is known as *Tanjong Gul* in the old maps of Singapore. ## Transport Gul is served by [SBS Transit](/wiki/SBS_Transit) industrial service 255 which links Gul to [Joo Koon Bus Interchange](/wiki/Joo_Koon_Bus_Interchange) and [Joo Koon MRT station](/wiki/Joo_Koon_MRT_station) except Gul Road which is located in [Pioneer Sector](/wiki/Pioneer_Sector) is served by industrial service 257 which also goes to [Joo Koon Bus Interchange](/wiki/Joo_Koon_Bus_Interchange). The below bus services run on the roads that form the boundary of Gul: 254 and 257 ply Benoi Road and Pioneer Road, 192 and 193 ply [Jalan Ahmad Ibrahim](/wiki/Jalan_Ahmad_Ibrahim) and Tuas Road. All the bus services above links the area to [Joo Koon MRT station](/wiki/Joo_Koon_MRT_station). [Gul Circle MRT station](/wiki/Gul_Circle_MRT_station), which is located along Tuas Road, was opened on 18 June 2017. The MRT station opens simultaneously with the other stations of the [East West line](/wiki/East_West_MRT_line) Tuas West Extension. ## Neighbouring Areas This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Gul Circle
